page.title: 06AGRICULTURE:GOAT KEEPING
page.content: On{Hall Cottage Farm}they keep goats. The goats were black and white and some were tan and shandy.Some goats have two tassles under their chin which were used for{breathing}a long time ago.Most goats have horns but some farmers do not like these so they get their goats dehorned.This has to be done when they are a few days old,because if it was left till later then it would damage their brains.In the winter the goats are taken into the shed for warmth. The goats on the farm produce milk.The{milk}is used for the baby animals on the farm and is sold,chiefly to people who are allergic to cows milk.Goats are intelligent animals:they have a black goat which is the leader and they always line up in a special order to be milked.
